nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期中国人民解放军的五大主力部队之一，由东北野战军在1949年3月11日改称而来，1955年4月番号撤销，所部转隶广州军区。
description.en: One of the five main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the second Chinese Civil War. It was renamed from the Northeast Field Army on March 11, 1949, and its designation was abolished in April 1955, with its units being transferred to the Guangzhou Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四野战军的前身，由东北民主联军于1948年1月1日改称而来。
description.en: The predecessor of the Fourth Field Army of the People's Liberation Army, renamed from the Northeast Democratic United Army on January 1, 1948.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民解放军的前身，由东北人民自治军于1945年11月14日改称而来。
description.en: The predecessor of the Northeast People's Liberation Army, renamed from the Northeast People's Self-Governing Army on November 14, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 东北民主联军的前身，于1945年11月4日在沈阳宣告成立。
description.en: The predecessor of the Northeast Democratic United Army, founded in Shenyang on November 4, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任第四野战军及其前身部队的司令员。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, served as the commander of the Fourth Field Army and its predecessor units.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任第四野战军及其前身部队的政治委员。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, served as the political commissar of the Fourth Field Army and its predecessor units.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任东北野战军参谋长及第14兵团司令员。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Chief of Staff of the Northeast Field Army and Commander of the 14th Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任第四野战军及其前身部队的政治部主任。
description.en: Grand General of the People's Liberation Army, served as the Director of the Political Department of the Fourth Field Army and its predecessor units.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任第四野战军参谋长。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Chief of Staff of the Fourth Field Army.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 指在中国人民解放军中服役的日籍人员。第四野战军曾收编约3万名日籍军人。
description.en: Refers to Japanese personnel who served in the People's Liberation Army. The Fourth Field Army incorporated approximately 30,000 Japanese soldiers.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民自治军改称为东北民主联军。
description.en: The Northeast People's Self-Governing Army was renamed the Northeast Democratic United Army.

description.zh-cn: 东北民主联军改称为东北人民解放军。
description.en: The Northeast Democratic United Army was renamed the Northeast People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 东北野战军（东北人民解放军的野战部队）改称为中国人民解放军第四野战军。
description.en: The Northeast Field Army (the field force of the Northeast People's Liberation Army) was renamed the Fourth Field Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军领导机关与中原军区领导机关合并，组成第四野战军兼华中军区（后改称中南军区）领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Fourth Field Army merged with that of the Central Plains Military Region to form the leading organ of the Fourth Field Army and the Central China Military Region (later renamed the Central South Military Region).

description.zh-cn: 中南军区改编为广州军区，中南军区兼第四野战军番号撤销。
description.en: The Central South Military Region was reorganized into the Guangzhou Military Region, and the designation of the Central South Military Region and the Fourth Field Army was abolished.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第四野战军是中国人民解放军的主力部队之一。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army was one of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军直属中央军事委员会领导。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army was directly under the leadership of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民自治军由进军东北的八路军、新四军及东北抗日联军为骨干组建而成。
description.en: The Northeast People's Self-Governing Army was formed with the Eighth Route Army, New Fourth Army, and Northeast Anti-Japanese United Army that marched into the Northeast as its backbone.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民自治军由进军东北的八路军、新四军及东北抗日联军为骨干组建而成。
description.en: The Northeast People's Self-Governing Army was formed with the Eighth Route Army, New Fourth Army, and Northeast Anti-Japanese United Army that marched into the Northeast as its backbone.

description.zh-cn: 东北人民自治军由进军东北的八路军、新四军及东北抗日联军为骨干组建而成。
description.en: The Northeast People's Self-Governing Army was formed with the Eighth Route Army, New Fourth Army, and Northeast Anti-Japanese United Army that marched into the Northeast as its backbone.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第四野战军
中国人民解放军第四野战军
中国人民解放军第四野战军
中国人民解放军第四野战军

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军是第二次国共内战时期中国人民解放军的主力部队。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army was a main force of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战中，第四野战军及其前身部队与国民政府领导的国军作战。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, the Fourth Field Army and its predecessor units fought against the National Revolutionary Army led by the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 东北野战军（东北人民解放军）发动辽沈战役，击败东北全境的大部分国军。
description.en: The Northeast Field Army (Northeast People's Liberation Army) launched the Liaoshen Campaign, defeating most of the Nationalist forces throughout the Northeast.

description.zh-cn: 东北野战军（东北人民解放军）与华北军区部队共同发动平津战役。
description.en: The Northeast Field Army (Northeast People's Liberation Army) jointly launched the Pingjin Campaign with troops from the North China Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军以第15兵团为主力实施渡海作战，解放海南岛。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army, with the 15th Army Group as its main force, carried out an amphibious operation to liberate Hainan Island.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军配合第二、第三野战军发起渡江战役。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army coordinated with the Second and Third Field Armies to launch the Yangtze River Crossing Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 东北民主联军发动新开岭战役，歼灭国军第52军第25师。
description.en: The Northeast Democratic United Army launched the Xinkailing Campaign, annihilating the 25th Division of the KMT's 52nd Army.

description.zh-cn: 东北民主联军在第二次四平战役中失利，放弃四平等重要城市。
description.en: The Northeast Democratic United Army was defeated in the Second Battle of Siping and abandoned important cities such as Siping.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军在衡阳、宝庆及阳江、阳春地区击败白崇禧部主力。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army defeated the main forces of Bai Chongxi in the Hengyang, Baoqing, and Yangjiang, Yangchun areas.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军在衡阳、宝庆及阳江、阳春地区击败余汉谋部。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army defeated the forces of Yu Hanmou in the Hengyang, Baoqing, and Yangjiang, Yangchun areas.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军将第164师和第156师的朝鲜族士兵转移编入朝鲜人民军。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army transferred Korean soldiers from the 164th and 156th Divisions to the Korean People's Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第四野战军

description.zh-cn: 第四野战军曾收编约3万名日籍军人。
description.en: The Fourth Field Army incorporated approximately 30,000 Japanese soldiers.
